title: Still have the old patcher
body:
AS the title says, im still using the old patcher, i have no idea why this is or how to fix it. Everything seems to be working fine though, it is just odd....

Anyone have any ideas how to fix this?

replies.body: You can force the patcher to update itself by going to your "League of Legends\RADS\projects" folder and deleting the "lol_patcher" folder in there. (Normally located in "C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\RADS\projects"). Once you delete it, open League of Legends and you should see it start updating. This will take some time the new patcher is about 250 megs.

> [{quoted}](name=Kao Atlantis,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=9QUy6tEE,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2014-09-07T20:06:47.800+0000)
>
> You can force the patcher to update itself by going to your "League of Legends\RADS\projects" folder and deleting the "lol_patcher" folder in there. (Normally located in "C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\RADS\projects"). Once you delete it, open League of Legends and you should see it start updating. This will take some time the new patcher is about 250 megs.

I do not have that folder. 
I have 

* air_client

* air_client_config_na

* game_client

* game_client_en_us

* lol_launcher
